Appeal of COLLEGE POINT BOAT CORPORATION. Docket No. 764. Submitted January 22, 1925; decided January 31, 1925. J. G. Mammack, Esq., for the taxpayer. R. A. Littleton, Esq. (Nelson T. Hartson, Solicitor of Internal Revenue) for the Commissioner. Before Graubner, Littleton, and Smith.

No opinion found. Click here to view source material.
